# AWS Global Accelerator

## Problem

![](https://velog.velcdn.com/images/xodbs1123/post/3932ec94-efd4-4aba-a098-02c6d4717f10/image.png)

> hop: 라우터 or 서버

지연 시간 + 연결 끊길지도

## Unicast IP vs Anycast IP

- Unicast IP: 1서버 1IP
- Anycast IP: n서버 1IP (가장 가까운 서버로 연결됨)

## AWS Global Accelerator

- **2 Anycast IP** are created for your application
- anycast IP는 사용자와 가장 가까운 edge location으로 트래픽을 직접 전송함
- The Edge locations send the traffic to your application

![](data:image/png;base64,)

- Works with Elastic IP, EC2 Instances, ALB, NLB, public or private
- 안정적 성능
	- 지능형 라우팅; 지연 시간이 가장 짧은 엣지 로케이션으로 연결됨
	- 신속한 리전 장애 조치
	- No issue with client cache (because the IP doesn't change)
	- Internal AWS network
- Health Checks
	- 애플리케이션이 글로벌한지 확인함 (상태확인 실패시 1분 안에 장애 조치)
	- Great for disaster recovery (thanks to the health checks)
- Security
	- only 2 external IP need to be whitelisted
	- DDoS protection thanks to AWS Shield

## AWS Global Accelerator vs CloudFront
### 공통점

- They both use the AWS global network and its edge locations around the world
- Both services integrate with AWS Shield for DDoS protection

### 차이점

- **CloudFront**
	- Improves performance for both cacheble content (such as images and videos)
	- Dynamic content (such as API acceleration and dynamic site delivery)
	- Content is served at the edge
- **Global Accelerator**
	- Improves performance for a wide range of applications over TCP or UDP
	- Proxying packets at the edge to applications running in one or more AWS Regions (no caching)
	- Good fit for non-HTTP use cases, such as gaming (UDP), IoT (MQTT), or Voice over IP
	- Good for HTTP use cases that require static IP addresses
	- Good for HTTP use cases that required deterministic, fast regional failover
